group_1.textLeft: Is a small price to pay!@…

group_1.textRight: I see this place is still quiet as ever.

group_1.textLeft: Err… Well…@[chara:300900:motion_300:effect_emotion_sad_0][se:7224_fall_into]I guess I can't deny it.[chara:300900:lipSynch_0]

group_1.textRight: All of this is thanks to your hard work@getting the word out about us!

group_1.narration: That's right.@Thanks to my marketing work,@we're suddenly super popular...
I'm glad the restaurant, @and not just me, is @getting popular again too…
But all the requests we@get are for guest chef jobs.
It's frustrating, but the little rabbit@is right. Nothing's new. You can still@hear a pin drop when you come in...

group_1.textRight: Watch the place for me, okay?

group_1.textLeft: But we probably won't even get a single@customer today...

group_1.narration: Still, thanks to the work@coming in, at least our@profits are increasing...
Even though originally my father said he@wanted to fill the restaurant with customers @again, like it was in the old days…
Seeing him go out to cook@every day, I have to admit@he looks really happy.

group_1.textLeft: I wonder if my dad is really satisfied@with how things are...
It sure is quiet in here…
What was the point of it all?
Why did I work so hard to@promote our restaurant?

group_1.textCenter: We're busy every day… @I'm probably just tired…
